mapper.select: SELECT P.PRODUCT_ID , P.PRODUCT_NAME , CI.PRODUCT_OPTION , CI.PRICE , CI.QUANTITY , CI.SUB_TOTAL , CI.IS_CHECKED FROM CARTS C INNER JOIN CART_ITEMS CI ON C.CART_ID = CI.CART_ID INNER JOIN PRODUCTS P ON CI.PRODUCT_ID = P.PRODUCT_ID WHERE C.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
SELECT CART_ID, SUM(SUB_TOTAL) AS SUM_SUB FROM CART_ITEMS WHERE CART_ID = #{cartId} AND IS_CHECKED = 'Y' GROUP BY CART_ID
